verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Cos I see the light surrounding you
So don't be afraid of something new

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Cos I see the light surrounding you
So don't be afraid of what you're turning into

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
No, don't be afraid
Don't be afraid

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Cos I see the light
Cos I see the light surrounding you
